## iter8 assert

assert if the experiment satisfies the specified conditions

```
iter8 assert [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -c, --condition strings   completed | nofailure | slos | slosby=<version number>
  -h, --help                help for assert
  -t, --timeout duration    timeout duration (e.g., 5s)
```
